knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
df <- data.frame(
  Run = factor( c("Plain","Traced") ),  
  Seconds=c(27, 60*27+1));
```
```{r, message=FALSE}
ggplot(df, aes(Run, Seconds) ) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```
